HÉR ER SMÁ     ,FAQ,
This is the Red Faction FAQ. You may find that it is not so much a
FAQ in the literal sense, because a great majority of the questions
are not necessarily frequently asked; however, it is a tremendous
resource for anyone looking to find whatever known information
there is about Red Faction, no matter how obscure said information
may be.
Listed below are all of the categories within the FAQ. You'll find
that a number of questions have been repeated in multiple
categories. This was intentional. Let's say you want to find info
on something pertaining to geo-modding physics within the editor,
because this question can apply to both the GEO-MODDING/PHYSICS
section as well as the MODDING/RED section the question was
duplicated in each so that browsing the FAQ would be easier and
finding answers to your questions faster. You'll also notice that a
lot of the answers appear as if Volition employees were answering
them personally.
This is because the FAQ was not so much written, as it was
compiled from literally thousands of VBB posts, and dozens if not
hundreds of previews and interviews. In fact, a great majority of
the answers are direct or paraphrased quotes from Volition
employees where only certain grammatical aspects were changed for
legibility. Because it would be a terribly daunting task to
completely rewrite each answer to negate the Volition presence,
it was decided best to simply leave it be. Now, with that said, it
should also be understood that this is not an official Volition
product, and while all of the answers are certainly credible and
none are malicious lies or stretches of the truth by any means,
they should still not be taken as gospel simply because Volition
Watch is not in any way affiliated with Volition Inc. With all of
this mumbo-jumbo said, we do hope that the FAQ answers all of your
questions, but if, by chance, there is something we missed, you are
always welcome to ask in either our general forum here at Volition
Watch or at the official VBB.
Já tær snilld…
……..SAGAN……
You are a miner named Parker, toiling in the mines on Mars for a
deceiving company known as Ultor. The conditions are worsening day
by day, and there is talk of a rebillion. All the miners are
suffering from a strange, deadly disease called the Plague that is
suddenly sweeping through their ranks.
The miners' anger and resentment are ready to boil over, and the
player provides the spark that starts a rebellion against Ultor.
The player's goal is to stay alive long enough to bring down Ultor
and solve the mystery of the Plague. This journey takes him from
gritty subterranean mines to Ultor's pristine science and nanotech
labs to the surface of Mars and even onto satellites orbiting high
above the planet.
